pages.text: Bali Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fi `Izzatin Wa Shiqaqin
Kam 'Ahlakna Min Qablihim Min Qarnin Fanadaw Walata Hina Manasin
Wa `Ajibu 'An Ja'ahum Mundhirun Minhum Wa Qala Al-Kafiruna Hadha Sahirun Kadhabun
Wa Antalaqa Al-Mala'u Minhum 'Ani Amshu Wa Asbiru `Ala 'Alihatikum 'Inna Hadha Lashay'un Yuradu
Ma Sami`na Bihadha Fi Al-Millati Al-'Akhirati 'In Hadha 'Illa Akhtilaqun
A'uunzila `Alayhi Adh-Dhikru Min Baynina Bal Hum Fi Shakkin Min Dhikri Bal Lamma Yadhuqu `Adhabi
Am `Indahum Khaza'inu Rahmati Rabbika Al-`Azizi Al-Wahhabi
Am Lahum Mulku As-Samawati Wa Al-'ArÄ‘i Wa Ma Baynahuma Falyartaqu Fi Al-'Asbabi
Jundun Ma Hunalika Mahzumun Mina Al-'Ahzabi
Kadhabat Qablahum Qawmu Nuhin Wa `Adun Wa Fir`awnu Dhu Al-'Awtadi
Wa Thamudu Wa Qawmu Lutin Wa 'Ashabu Al-'Aykati 'Ula'ika Al-'Ahzabu
Wa Ma Yanzuru Ha'uula' 'Illa Sayhatan Wahidatan Ma Laha Min Fawaqin
Wa Qalu Rabbana `Ajjil Lana Qittana Qabla Yawmi Al-Hisabi
